title: Cinematic Impacts, Risers, Whooshes, Drops
description: A collection with many varieties of cinematic sounds, including 320 high-quality sound effects of impacts, whooshes, drops, risers. Great for trailers, game scenes - horror special effects, explosions of spaceships, volcanoes, planets, etc.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/cinematic-impacts-risers-whooshes-drops

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2bgh560o97qnc4d/MSE%20-%20Cinematic%20Impacts%2C%20Risers%2C%20Whooshes%2C%20Drops.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 320 cinematic sound effects, including:

  • 80 impacts
  • 80 risers
  • 80 whooshes
  • 80 drops


Need to sound the explosions of a spaceship, a space base or a planet, or maybe the whole galaxy?

This package is great for that purpose. Feel free to use it for the sounds of the Earth's crust cracking, volcanic explosions and other realistic, alien, extraterrestrial futuristic objects of large and medium size.

The sound pack is also suitable for horror special effects.

For a more massive effect, you can layered impact sounds.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 320 game-ready cinematic sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 80 impacts, booms, hits
  • 80 risers, 80 drops, 80 whooshes
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes of various genres


Number of Audio Waves: 320

Number of Audio Cues: 320

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 52 minutes 40 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
